series.title: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
series.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Fortune Feimster
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: She's Nurse Colette on "The Mindy Project", Dougie on "Life in Pieces", and one of the funniest comedians around - Fortune Feimster - and she's here on "Allegedly"!  The lesbian laughster talks about Kaling, Handler, Aniston and Jacquelyn Smith - not the Angel, but her girlfriend!  Sitting in the judge's chair, nothing is off limits for Feimster from bringing back the bush to coming out of the closet, but in the end, the she's got to pick which host she would most want to repopulate the Earth with in case of the apocalypse.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Tim Matheson
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Tim Matheson is in the house with some real animals now!  Matheson, who played Otter in the classic "Animal House" and currently plays Ronald Reagan in the National Geographic flick "Killing Reagan" sat down with the hosts to discuss his long career working with greats like John Belushi, Lucille Ball, Michael Landon, Chris Farley, Chevy Chase, and so many more.  Matheson let years of cinematic history spill - including roles he turned down, people he's feuded with and some good old fashioned tales of Hollywood sex, drugs, rock and roll.  From Nancy Reagan's reputation to casting couches to the plot of the new "Jumanji", film, Matheson holds nothing back in this interview which has points flying all over the place, leaving the win decision down to the very end.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Aaron Carter
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He's back!  Remember child star, singer, actor Aaron Carter?  He may have disappeared from the public eye for a beat, but he was only working on his craft, coming back stronger than ever with his new album LOVE.  Live the ups and downs of being a celebrity at such a young age, to traveling the world, to hitting rock bottom, to bouncing back with a vengeance.  Carter updates everyone on his love life (he's ready for marriage and kids), his competition (look out Justin Bieber), his relationship with brother Backstreet Boy Nick Carter (it's getting back to normal), and even how his mother once sold his hair on Ebay.  Using demerits instead of points, Carter takes charge of the competition, making both hosts work their asses off to pull in a win.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Brad Meltzer
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "Allegedly" takes on the New York Times Best Seller list for the first time when award winning thriller writer, children's writer, comic book writer, and Ted Talk-er Brad Meltzer sits down to discuss his new children's book "I Am Jim Henson".  Find out which writers are too big for their own britches (not you Judy Blume)... which Kardashian he'd never write a book about... and what the award winning "Justice League" writer thinks about the upcoming movie version of the iconic comic.  It's our most intellectual "Allegedly" yet, but but let's be serious, he just hires children in Nicaragua to write his novels these days (no seriously, he said it...).

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: David Weintraub
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The Geppetto behind some of your favorite reality stars - practically all of them - mega-manager and reality TV producer David Weintraub is here to get everything and anything off his chest.  Ray Jay, Kim Kardashian, Scott Disick, Jonathan Cheban, Courtney Stodden, Jon Gosselin, Paris Hilton, Tori Spelling, Tara Reid, and so many more aren't safe when the former "Sons of Hollywood" star and "Hollywood Hillbillies" producer lets it all spill.  Find out the secrets behind the Kardashians - Was Kris Jenner really behind the Kim K sex tape?  Did Scott Disick cheat on Kourtney?  Who the hell is Jonathan Cheban?  How much does that sex tape rake in?  All that and an epic competition between the hosts on this week's "Allegedly".

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: "Please Like Me" Stars Josh Thomas and Thomas Ward
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: It's our first trip down under as the stars of Hulu's Australian hit show "Please Like Me", Josh Thomas and Thomas Ward, come in to talk kangaroos and didgeridoos... and Lena Dunham.  The real life best friends fill us in on the new season (and why it's most likely their last), open relationships, dying boyfriends, Harry Potter and the joys of the uterus.  With one straight guest and one gay guest each host has a cheerleader, but will that factor in on the ultimate win?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Adam Carolla
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: It's about to get all bro up in here when podcast genius, "The Man Show" co-host and "The 24 Hour War" director Adam Carolla fills the guest's chair on "Allegedly".  The former "Celebrity Apprentice" star weighs in on the Donald (and his Twitter feud with the Ah-nold), the Kimmel, and the Pinsky, while discussing his new documentary about the long standing Ford versus Ferrari feud.  All this - and discover the mystery identity of a man named Brexit - on this week's episode.  Who will be victorious?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Margaret Cho
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: She's a comedy legend - just ask her - Margaret Cho - and she's here in the studio to dish about everything.  She covers Golden Globes fashion, Tilda Swinton, Asian casting, orgies, Kevin Spacey, death by execution, and so much more!  But her story about watching John Travolta eat an entire boysenberry pie in one sitting will go down in history as one of the best "Allegedly" stories of all time.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Best of 2016
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary:
Its the BEST OF 2016, from Allegedly! Thanks for all of your support. Starring:
David Faustino
Jamie Kennedy
Zachery Ty Bryan
Dr. Drew
Farrah Abraham
Mark McGrath
Cheri Oteri 
Ross Mathews
Jerry O'Connell
Abby Lee Miller
Maksim Chmerkovskiy
Heather McDonald

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Stassi Schroeder
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Jennifer Lawrence just named her as her celebrity crush.  She's been in the news recently after a very controversial episode of "Vanderpump Rules".  And she's the girl everybody loves to hate - Stassi Schroeder is in the studio!  Schroeder came in to clear up her recent "mental breakdown" tweets and why she's pissed at the show... to discuss Jennifer Lawrence's crush (although she doesn't pick Lawrence as her own celebrity crush)... to clear up rumors of her dating life... and to give all the T on Lisa (do Lisa and Ken really bang), Katie (and her box eating), Scheana (and her divorce), Jax (huge mistake she admits), and the rest.  To top if off, you'll exclusively find out which celebrity tried to pick her up on a dating app with one word - "hey".  Though he didn't win her heart, one of the hosts sure does with a surprise win in the end.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: John Brotherton
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "Fuller House" is back - and we've got the show's hunky veterinarian John Brotherton!   What's it like making out with Candace Cameron?  Who would he bang, marry and kill - DJ, Stephanie or Kimmie Gibler?  Which co-star has a flatulence problem?  Get all your "Fuller House" dish, plus find out about how he helped recreate Paul Walker's character in the last "The Fast and the Furious" movie... if Bruce Willis is really as dick-ish as he seems... and who is the worst tipper he's ever met (hint:  It's a Black-Eyed Pea).

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Jeffrey Donovan
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Want to know the secret underworld of 'Psychic Readers'? Just how dark does it get behind the crystal ball? Jeffrey Donovan, star of the new Hulu show Shut Eye, Burn Notice, Sicario, and FARGO joins us on Allegedly for some candid and hilarious discussions on his humble beginnings, living in LA, everything you wanted to know about psychics, and what he learned playing both JFK and RFK. Plus he picks this week's winner! Are you a psychic? Who's it going to be, Matt or Theo?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Andy Cohen
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Andy Cohen - the man behind the "Housewives", behind "Watch What Happens Live", behind the new best seller "Superficial", and behind the hosts fantasies joins the "Allegedly" podcast to spill some MAJOR tea.  Kim Kardashian, Justin Bieber, Anderson Cooper, Sarah Jessica Parker, Madonna, Mariah Carey, Donald Trump and a solid game of "Would You Do That Threesome" provide hilarity and insight into the life (and sex life) of Bravo's main man.  Cohen lets us in on his own life - who he's dating, why he didn't take the Live With Kelly job, what are the biggest misconceptions about him, has he ever been high on the air, and what he hasn't accomplished yet - plus much more before picking a winner of this week's episode.  Who will it be - Matt or Theo?!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Former Bodyguard for Casey Anthony - Rob Dick
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "Allegedly" goes criminal as bounty hunter and former bodyguard for Casey Anthony steps into the studio and answers the ultimate question - did Casey or didn't Casey kill her daughter?  Find out what really went down behind the scenes of the trial and what kind of a person she really was.  On top of that, hear all about the life of a bounty hunter in this day and age - how they survive, how they date, and ultimately, how they catch the bad guy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Lauren Ash
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: One of the funniest (and dirtiest) to ever grace the podcast, "Superstore"'s very own Dina, Lauren Ash, is in the studio!  Giving points at will, the comedienne and former "Scare Tactics" star discusses everything from her favorite diseases to her new boyfriend Umberto (completely unrelated topics)... while dropping hints about what we can expect when "Superstore" returns along the way.  Who will she pick to win?  More importantly, why does she love Gary Busey?!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: John C. McGinley
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He's the white Samuel L. Jackson - the guy who pops up in every movie from "Office Space" to "Platoon" to "Point Break" to "The Rock" - JOHN C. MCGINLEY!  The former "Scrubs" star and current "Stan Against Evil" anti-hero joins the show to discuss his wild career... who is on his shit list in Hollywood (he's looking at you Ben Stiller)... and what makes an Irish Jew tick.  With special guest co-host comedian Mo Mandel - it's a whole new Thunderdome for McGinley to judge based on stories of pants pooping, skull splitting and some of the lamest evil laughs you've ever  heard.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Cedric Yarbrough
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: You know him from his hit new ABC show "Speechless", and from "RENO 911" as Deputy Jones, its Cedric Yarbrough in the 'Allegedly' Studio. Cedric will do his best to judge the boys as Matt talks about his cousin being a stalker and Theo talks about dressing up like a rabbit and getting accosted in a rest area bathroom.  And can we get Cedric to dish on a RENO 911 REUNION show? It’s all here on 'Allegedly'.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Betsy Brandt
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: 'Life in Pieces' star Betsy Brandt is our guest at this live studio audience taping from Entertainment Weekly’s POPFest in downtown Los Angeles. After listening to pieces of the boys’ lives in Round 1, Brandt talked about her new CBS sitcom ‘Life in Pieces’ and reminisced about scenes from Breaking Bad that left her emotions in pieces.  It was a hilarious hour including Theo’s advice from Robert Downey Jr, Betsy's Barbara Streisand story, and Matt's job as a Barbie mule1    With Matt’s own mother front and center in the studio audience, was this a episode a must win for Matt? Who would Betsy Brandt choose? Listen!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Ryan McCartan
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: It's just a jump to your left... and then a step... into the "Allegedly" podcast studio where Ryan McCartan star of the new "The Rocky Horror Picture Show" and the upcoming "The Standoff" fills the guest seat just in time for Halloween.  McCartan talks about Brian Bostwick's enormous penis... what it's really like to be a Disney star... and how he's been adjusting since his engagement was called off.  With tales of auditions gone wrong and farting gym sessions, McCartan will have to pick a winner of the week between Matt and special co-host, Ari Mannis himself!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: MICHELLE VISAGE
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Who wants to hear the T?  "RuPaul's Drag Race" judge and former girl band extraordinaire Michelle Visage drops in the studio this week and joins Matt and special guest host Kelly Berning from TMZ.  Did you know Dr. Ray did her boob job?  Or Belinda Carlisle was a bitch to her?  Or she dated one of the guys from Milli Vanilli for 9 months?  Or that that filmed three endings to this season's "Drag Race"?  It's a T explosion.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Manika Ward
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: She's collaborated with Tyga, gone on tour with One Direction, and hit the top 10 on the Billboard charts, but today Manika Ward is stuck in the "Allegedly" hot seat with Theo Von on one side and guest host "Big Brother" and QVC alum Will Kirby on the other.  Why can't Tyga pay his bills?  Which One Directioner would she marry, bang or kill?  And does she fancy the ladies?  Find out the answer to all this in between tales of Jessica Simpson's acne and banging a girl band member and find out who Manika picks to win it all on this episode of "Allegedly".

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Adam Ray
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He's SLIMER from Ghostbuster's 2 as well as a star of the new MAD tv on the CW, rising star Adam Ray is in studio.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Melora Hardin
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: She was Jan on "The Office"... Tammy on "Transparent"... and starred on pretty much every show ever aired since 1976 from "Little House on the Prairie" to "Murder She Wrote".  But none of that compares to her amazing performance on... "Allegedly".  Find out what it really feels like to lose at the Emmy's... which young famous actor she worked with and wanted to bang... and what it was like to ALMOST star in "Back to the Future".  With a Broadway show tune competition in round 3, the pressure is on... Melora... to pick which voice was the best of the worst.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Courtney Stodden
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The always crazy and controversial Courtney Stodden is in the studio letting it all hang out - literally.  The bosomed beaut talks all about her crazy marriage to "The Green Mile" star Doug Hutchison, including their recent miscarriage, their enormous age difference, and the problems that face their relationship.  Find out what celebrity she hates, what celebrity she wants to bang, and why the hell she carries a sippy cup with her wherever she goes.  But judge not lest thou be judged, as the hosts face Stodden who will ultimately pick the winner of the day.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: David Spade
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The Rob Lowe Roastmaster DAVID SPADE is in studio, talking all the dirt behind the Roast.  He talks Anne Coulter, Joe Dirt, Joe Dirt 2, and muchas mas.  Theo has a story about sobriety, Matt talks about how Kerry Washington played his wingwoman.  Its all here.  Now.  Allegedly.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Abby Lee Miller
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Love her or hate her, "Dance Moms" star Abby Lee Miller knows how to create amazing dancers... and endless controversy.  In her first sit down interview since pleading guilty to bankruptcy fraud, the self-proclaimed Pittsburgh podunk Lifetime star brings her judging skills to "Allegedly" to pick a winner between Matt and guest host "Big Brother" all star Dr. Will Kirby.  In between scoring, Miller opens up about her fears to go to prison... how things went wrong for her financially... who she's hooking up with these days... and how she can make a kid cry in 30 seconds flat.  Hear the Dance Mom coach take responsibility for her actions in a candid way, proving that none of us are perfect.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Lance Bass
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Attention all NSYNC fans - Lance Bass is here to answer the question on everyone's mind - which Kardashian would he screw, marry and kill?!  The man-bander sits in the hot seat to judge Matt and special guest co-host, "Big Brother" favorite Jeff Schroeder, as the regale tales of linebackers and Hollywood nights.  Bass spills the T on JT, his thoughts on Lou Pearlman, his new "gay Bachelor" esque show, the possibilities of an NSYNC reunion, and which A Lister he hooked up with.  Catch it all on "Allegedly"!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Jonathan Tucker
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He may play the agro Jay on "Kingdom", but Jonathan Tucker is nothing but a teddy bear in our studio!  The veteran actor who has starred on "Justified" and "Parenthood" and classic films like "The Virgin Suicides" and "Sleepers" talks about his career, his marriage, and what Nick Jonas looks like naked.  But the competition all comes down to an arm wrestle between the hosts that Tucker moderates... but who will be champion?!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Asa Akira
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: We've got the funniest porn star in the game Asa Akira in the studio, talking about her new book 'Dirty Thirty'.  Even if you dont like porn, you will love her. We learn about Matt's brief foray into the porn scene, how Theo peeped on his friend's sexual experience amidst gunfire, and how Asa doesnt even like watching straight sex.  Also, we learn alot about comedic sidekick Ari Mannis.  You'll love it.  Listen.  Subscribe!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Farrah Abraham
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Love her or hate her, "Teen Mom" star Farrah Abraham is in the house on "Allegedly" today, letting everyone know she ain't going nowhere.  From her sex tape to her daughter to Nicki Minaj to Dr. Drew to politics, no topic is left untouched in this revealing chat with the reality star, and she even answers the question we all want to know - how thirsty is she?!  Judging stories about pooping at open houses and getting emancipated at a young age, Abraham doesn't hold back in the least, even calling out the politicians who have offered her money for sex.  You gotta listen!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Simon Rex
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: It's time to play "Simon Says" with this week's guest, Dirt Nasty himself, Simon Rex!  The model/actor/VJ/rapper/comedian sits in the hot seat and reminisces about some of the craziest experiences from his life in Hollywood.  Simon says his two cents on dating Paris Hilton, working with Charlie Sheen, his infamous porn past and more in between stories of Burger King commercials gone wrong and abandoning friends in strange basements which leads to a tete a tete competition of the best (or worst) pick-up lines of all time.  Who will leave victorious?!  Listen up!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Alexander DiPersia
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The lights are shining on "Lights Out" star Alexander DiPersia when he sits in the infamous "Allegedly" hot seat to discuss the hit horror film.  We get down and dirty discussing a recent massage incident he went through that involved the good old pineapple choke, as well as his pal Vito Schnabel's relationship with Heidi Klum, the crazy life of an art dealer, and the valuable art of horror film screaming.  Which host will win and which will get the lights out... see what we did there?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Tom Stevens
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Canada gets it's due day on "Allegedly" this week when "Wayward Pines" star and true Canadian citizen Tom Stevens sits in the hot seat.  Though he plays a young dictator on the show, he's anything but on "Allegedly" as he spills the beans about the final episodes of "Wayward" this season, his upcoming plans to get eloped in New Orleans, and why he read Mein Kampf... twice.  In the end, the hosts have to pick five people to save in case of an apocalypse, leaving Stevens with all the power.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Nikki Ziering
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: A favorite of Hugh Hefner, Bob Barker, and at one time Ian Ziering, former Playmate, Barker Beauty and reality star Nikki Ziering stops by and answers the obvious question "where have you been?!".  Nikki gives us the update plus shares some of her favorite stories from her time in the spotlight involving Mick Jagger, Bruce Jenner, and Ian himself.  Find out where Nikki's opinions lie when it comes to her ex these days, and would she ever do a nude spread again?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Dr. Drew
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Dr. Drew is in the house!  The famed TV and radio doc chimes in on Taylor Swift's love addiction, Ben Affleck's drinking issues, and Selma Blair's recent breakdown.  The friendly doc also gives us insight into his own love life, including when the last time he got road head was.  With stories of poop, a special STD contest, and questions about goiters, this episode has it all.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Rob Burnett
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He wrote and produced "The Late Show with David Letterman" for decades, but now Rob Burnett is in the "Allegedly" studio to talk about his new film starring Selena Gomez and Paul Rudd, "The Fundamentals of Caring", as well as judge an on-going battle between Matt and Theo.  Rob talks about Dave now, their relationship, whether he'll ever come out of retirement, and who the worst guest ever was.  Oh, he also talks about Selena Gomez Face-timing his son's entire hockey team.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Claudia Jordan
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "The Price is Right", "The Celebrity Apprentice", "Deal Or No Deal", and "The Real Housewives of Atlanta" - today's guest is no stranger to the world of reality television.  The model has sparked attention over and over again for her outspoken behavior on and off the TV screen, but today's she's REALLY going to spill it all - Khloe Kardashian, Donald Trump, the Housewives - Jordan spills the T for us all.  So, who are your bets on for to take home this week's win?  You gotta listen to play!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Kevin Pollak
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: We've got Robert DeNiro in the studio... and Al Pacino... and Liam Neeson... all in the form of actor/comedian Kevin Pollak.  The star of such classics as "A Few Good Men" and "The Usual Suspects" lends his talents to the competition this week, judging stories about Christopher Reeve and mushrooms, as well as some unique impressions from the hosts themselves.  Pollak, who directed the upcoming film "Late Bloomer" shares his own tales about Tom Cruise, Michael Clarke Duncan and Christopher Walken, which may leave you shocked and... dying of laughter.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Brian "Head" Welch
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Things get powerful when Brian "Head" Welch, guitarist from the mega-huge band KoRn, stops in to discuss his new book "With Eyes Wide Open", his gut wrenching tale of drugs, family, faith, and forgiveness that led him to leave the band then rejoin it in 2013.  You can't get any more candid or honest than Welch as he discusses hitting rock bottom, giving up a kid for adoption, tracking eight balls on FedEx and being joyful that he's even alive.  But it's not all serious, the laughter comes in waves, especially with tales of vomit and dead skunks and a gospel sing off.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Ta'Rhonda Jones
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Needing your "Empire" fix after last week's finale?  Well, Porsha herself, Ta'Rhonda Jones, is in the studio to talk all about that climactic pregnant woman falling to her possible death finale and what it's really like to be on a huge hit like this.  Jones also opens up a lot about her past - including her brother's death, her time working at a nursing home (and the old dudes who groped her), and her failed engagement.  But none of that compares to the kick she gets out of playing judge between the hosts which ends in an epic freestyle rap battle for the ages.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: David Faustino
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Bud Bundy is in the house!  "Married with Children" star David Faustino brings some wild, wild stories to "Allegedly" while judging the hosts to pick a winner (and judging the hosts in general).  If you ever wondered which Beatle was a huge "Married with Children" fan, listen up... and find out the AMAZINGLY X-RATED message he told Faustino to relay to Christina Applegate.  Faustino fills us in on the "Married" reboot... his favorite "Married" guest star... what regrets he has in life... and most importantly, what it felt like doing a voice on "The Gummi Bears" cartoon.  With stories about Vanilla Ice and disappointing multiple women at once, Faustino has a lot to consider when he picks who the winner of "Allegedly" should be this week.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Adam Rodriguez
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: It's magic when "Magic Mike" star Adam Rodriguez stops by to play judge, jury, and executioner this week (as well as fulfill some of Matt's fantasies).  Find out which co-star's junk he saw... his regrets over "CSI: Miami"... and his daughter's playdates with Channing Tatum.  Rodriguez, who hosts his own podcast, let's it all hang out, in the best way possible.  But, who will win his heart?!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Nolan Gould
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "Allegedly" goes... underage!  Our first teenage guest - "Modern Family" star Nolan Gould who plays Luke Dunphy on the show - stops by to fill the judge's seat and listen to some bizarre stories, advice, and questions.  Gould reveals which "MF" stars he has crushes on... that audition where he mistook Russell Simmons for Richard Simmons... and how often he gets hit on by MILFS.  In the end, he must choose a winner, but in the process, he lets us know how hard out there it is for a teenage pimp these days.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: John Popper
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He's regarded as the world's best harmonica player, but we remember him best as the lead singer of the band Blues Traveler!  Let your inner 1990's child free as Popper reveals what it was REALLY like being in one of the most popular bands of the decade.  Popper even breaks out his instrument to pick a feud with his harmonica'ed arch enemy - Alanis Morissette.  Find out about the ups and downs of Popper's career, his health, his weight, his family and how much it would cost for him to deliver your baby.  But the big question - which "Allegedly" host floats his boat more?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Jillian Bell & Charlotte Newhouse
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: If you don't know who Jillian Bell and Charlotte Newhouse are, then YOU DON'T KNOW FUNNY!  Bell, who starred in "22 Jump Street" and "Workaholics", and Newhouse are both on the hit Comedy Central show "Idiotsitter", but today they're both in the "Allegedly" hot seat.  Have they ever hooked up?  Why was writing for "Saturday Night Live" so awful for Jillian?  What actor hit on Charlotte in the lamest way?  Find out the answers to all these questions - and discover why a cockroach once got stuck in Theo's babysitter's ear canal - on this episode of "Allegedly".  By the way, wait until you hear Jillian's impression of Drew Barrymore - flawless.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Cheryl Burke
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: As "Dancing with the Stars" continues right now with season who-the-hell-cares, former star and sexpot Cheryl Burke stops in the studio to talk all things "Dancing", as well as what's going on with her personal life.  Find out which dancers on the show she's hooked up with and who was her least favorite dancing partner ever (she even tried to get eliminated on purpose).  Burke also gets real about her former partner Rob Kardashian's weight gain and engagement, and discusses why her own relationships haven't ended with a walk down the aisle.  But which host dances their way into her heart with better questions and a more interesting story?  Listen and find out.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Ross Mathews
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: If you've ever wanted to hear what it would sound like if Ross Mathews auditioned for "12 Years A Slave", today's your lucky day!  Yes, the "Hollywood Today Live" host joins the podcast and nothing is off limits.  Whether it's about Caitlyn Jenner, Chelsea Handler and Heather McDonald, or the existence of homophobia still in Hollywood, Mathews tells it like it is, hysterically.  When his dream of playing a dramatic role in a movie is discussed, Mathews steps up to the mic and does his best slave owner performance.  You don't want to miss that.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Kato Kaelin
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He's the most famous houseguest of all time, Kato Kaelin is in the studio!  With the new FX series about the OJ trial, Kato opens up about his thoughts on the show, secrets from the trial, OJ's guilt, the Kardashians, and what it was like being hated by thousands of strangers.  The host/actor and founder of Slacker clothing line gets grilled by the guests Marcia Clark and Johnnie Cochran style.  But, when the tables turn, which side will Kato land on - Matt's or Theo's?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Roman Atwood & Dennis Roady
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He's known as the most "appalling" prankster in the world, but Roman Atwood loves it! With his millions of followers and brilliant pranks, including blowing up his own kid, Atwood has taken the internet by storm, and now he's moved on to the world of movies. Atwood and co-prankster Dennis Roady join "Allegedly" to talk about their new film "Natural Born Pranksters" and what it's like being loved and hated worldwide. The pranksters reveal the celeb prank they attempted that went south real fast (sorry Luke Bryan), the celeb they want to prank most (Justin Bieber), and how they plan on outdoing themselves again. In the middle of it all, the boys are caught in a tug of war between the hosts, each vying to take home the podcast win this week.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Jack Quaid
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: What do you get when you put Meg Ryan and Dennis Quaid together? The funny, endearing, and talented Jack Quaid, star of the hit HBO show "Vinyl" and "The Hunger Games", who sits in the judge's seat this week. Find out what it was like growing up as the kid of Meg and Dennis and how he handled their incredibly public divorce. Learn from Jack all the inside scoop on filming "Vinyl", what's going on with his uncle Randy, and what it's like being a bachelor in Hollywood. After Quaid sits through some awkward family stories from the hosts, he has to pick who is the winner... and who is the loser yet again.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Mel B
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: She's a Spice Girl, an "America's Got Talent" judge, and an all around fun chick - Mel B - and husband Stephan Belafonte are our special guests for this episode of "Allegedly". After hearing tales of Ben Affleck and some clitoral stimulation, Mel and Stephan spill some T on everything from her kid with Eddie Murphy (she considers Stephan her father), Simon Cowell replacing Howard Stern on "AGT" (Simon calls her FAT!) and the Spice Girl reunion, including Posh (she can be a bitch apparently). The couple discuss what keeps their sex life exciting, the possibility of more children, and more before picking the winner of the podcast and breaking one host's heart.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Erik Griffin
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Justin Bieber loves him. Miley Cyrus loves him. So, of course "Allegedly" loves him! It's Erik Griffin, star of Comedy Central's "Workaholics", in studio and ready to dish like a school girl. What's it like doing "Workaholics"? What was up with that heckler video? What was Justin Bieber's birthday party like? Find out all that and more as the mustached funny man takes the hot seat and must crown one of the hosts victor for the week!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: AnnaLynne McCord
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "Allegedly" gets real when former "90210" bombshell AnnaLynne McCord stops by to give her thoughts, as a rape survivor, on Kesha's current battle against Dr. Luke and whether or not she believes her claims.  McCord drops her reasoning why so many celebrities are rally around the pop star, and what Kesha should do to move on.  Also hear McCord confirm she's back together with "Prison Break" star Dominic Purcell and explain what went wrong the first time around.  In the end, McCord has to judge who won the podcast, though her own story about vibrating underwear definitely takes the cake.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Ryan Guzman
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: It's not every day you get one of the hottest (metaphorically and physically) rising young stars in the studio, but this week "Heroes" star Ryan Guzman pops in to talk J. Lo, MMA, dating, his insane body, and what went wrong with "Jem and the Holograms" (or as one host refers to it, "Jem and the Holocaust").  With tales about Nicole Kidman and "Impractical Joker" cruises gone wrongrfta, Guzman has his hands full trying to pick a winner... while one of the hosts tries to get a handful of Ryan for himself!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Brandi Glainville
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: She's always controversial.  She's always feisty.  And she's always dirty.  Brandi Glanville is in the studio for today's episode of "Allegedly with Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss" and updates us on everything from Yolanda's divorce to Kim's sobriety to Lisa's Botox.  Glanville holds nothing back about getting to third base withd Khloe Kardashian, the best celebrity sex she ever had (male and female), and why she's hanging out with LeAnn Rimes' ex-husband!  Scandalous stuff!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Amber Rose
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: As far as celebrity feuds go, the Rose-West beef is rocketing to new levels.  Amber Rose herself came in to the podcast to give her side of the story and respond to West's barrage of Tweets.  We get to the bottom (ha) of her fingers in the bunghole response, and hear all about the new 2016 Amber Rose.  Don't screw with her and she won't screw with you.  Rose discusses Blac Chyna and Rob Kardashian, the rumors about Scott Dissick, and why she wears her "stripper" title with pride.  Oh - and she's subjected to the hosts stories... poor girl.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Christina Milian
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: You know her from "Turned Up" and "Grandfathered" currently, but after hearing today's podcast with Christina Milian... you will know a lot MORE about her!  Milian stops in to judge the hosts about their stories of Chris Martin's penis and the power of Orgasmic Meditation, but in the process reveals a ton about herself.  Did you know she likes to hook up with chicks?  That she was almost a member of the Mickey Mouse Club?  That she's been with some famous white guys in secret?  That she got her butt waxed for Lil Wayne?  That she doesn't think Wayne, her ex, will ever get married?  Have a listen!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Heather McDonald
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Hilarious, Fashionable, Considerate - all words that Heather McDonald uses to describe… herself.  The hysterical comedienne and "Chelsea Lately" star takes the responsibility of picking a winner in a podcast episode filled with canine threesomes, the "ridiculous" idea of a female firefighter, and even references to Brian Dunkleman.  For the first time, McDonald reveals everything about what it's REALLY like to work for Chelsea Handler, for better or worse.  Also, find out what Heather thinks about Hollywood women crusading for equal rights ("Shut up, you dumb bitch"), as well as why her friends the Kardashians only date black dudes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Patrick Adams
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: What do you get when you combine "Wheel of Fortune", Burning Man, and street racing with a little person?  You get this week's episode of "Allegedly" starring USA's "Suits" star Patrick Adams as the guest judge and interview!  Hear the behind the scenes stories from the "Suits" set such as whether or not Adams has to tape his penis down during love scenes.  Patrick also discusses his fiancee, "Pretty Little Liars" star Troian Bellisario, his worst red carpet story with Sienna Miller, and the crazy stuff he's done at Burning Man.  In the end, a surprise guest comes in and changes the outcome of the competition completely.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Lou Diamond Phillips
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "I can't even go to my IMDB page because it makes me tired," says today's guest, the legendary Lou Diamond Phillips while discussing his 30 year career in Hollywood. The man of many ethnicities, accents and characters discusses life in "Holly-White" including the time he went skinny-dipping with Kiefer Sutherland, his thoughts on good friend Charlie Sheen's recent announcement, and the possibility of a "Young Guns" reboot! In the end, the winner of the podcast gets his own private performance of Ritchie Valens's "Oh Donna" by LDP himself, proving he's still got it, 28 years after "La Bamba" hit the theaters.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: The Miz
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: It's a "Real World/Road Rules Challenge" reunion when WWE superstar and former "Real World"-er The Miz reunites with Theo to reminisce about the old days and basically tear Matt to shreds. The Miz takes you behind the scenes of wrestling, discussing who has the worst gas in the WWE, which celebrity he modeled his character after, and what TERRIBLE idea he had for a catchphrase starting out (yeah, it didn't stick).

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Pras
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Pras Michel, one third of the incredibly popular 90's group The Fugees turned possible  Academy Award nominated documentarian for his film "Sweet Micky for President", stops by "Allegedly" and speaks his truth!  The "Ghetto Superstar" singer comments on the likelihood of a Fugees reunion, Wyclef and Lauryn Hill's affair, what it's like to be friends with President Obama, and that one time The Fugees thought their drummer killed a chick.  With stories about recreational steroids and douchebag actors, the hosts battle it out to get Pras's vote, but one of them has an advantage that no one saw coming.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Mark McGrath
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Right before heading to Stone Temple Pilots rockstar Scott Weiland's memorial, Sugar Ray frontman and former "Extra" host Mark McGrath stopped in to the "Allegedly" podcast to discuss the tragedy of Weiland's death, revealing personal insight behind Weiland's "romance with addiction" and hanging with him only weeks before.  McGrath also looks back on his own lowest moments, infidelities, and battles, while dishing all about Courtney Love, Dave Navarro and the real tragedy of Coldplay playing the Superbowl.  Meanwhile, Theo and Matt battle it out with crazy stories of Elton John and the Beaver himself, Jerry Mathers.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Dennis Quaid
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "Dennis Quaid is here" said Dennis Quaid when he walked into Allegedly with Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss. The star of the hit new Crackle show The Art of More fills the judge's chair this week in a podcast he himself refers to as "Little House on the Prairie meets Sophie's Choice".  Quaid gets candid about ALMOST every topic (sorry, we couldn't go into Randy territory) including Lindsay Lohan, Donald Trump, on-set tantrums, his twins' health, public divorces and his on-going search for a butt double. Any applications?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Jamie Kennedy
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Picture this:  You're trapped in the home of Fran Drescher as she tries to seduce you, taking off her clothing piece by piece.  What do you do?  Well, actor and comic Jamie Kennedy stops by "Allegedly" to answer that exact question!!!  Kennedy also spills the beans on what it was like dating Jennifer Love Hewitt, which famous dudes he's eskimo brothers with and how the "Scream" star really feels about the TV version of the film.  All that plus Kennedy judges the weekly host competition which gets tougher than ever before.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: EG Daily
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: If you've ever wanted to hear Tommy Pickles say the word "clitoris", then this is the podcast for you! E.G Daily, a.k.a. Dottie from "Pee Wee's Big Adventure" and the voice of Tommy Pickles from "Rugrats", is here to judge the podcast and wax poetic on her favorite topic - orgasmic meditation. Hear E.G.'s opinions on Pee Wee's movie theatre incident... that sex tape her husband made with Paris Hilton... and why she's considered Hollywood's good luck charm. With tales of Ke$ha and Nair revenge, Daily will have to decide who is the victor, though she and one of the hosts should really get a room (guess which one).

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Denise Richards
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Denise Richards, ex-wife of Charlie Sheen and mother to his two daughters, stopped by "Allegedly with Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss" last week WAY before Sheen's big anticipated announcement tomorrow.  Though she doesn't talk about the HIV issue (this interview was recorded BEFORE the news broke), Richards has some interesting stuff to say about Charlie, their kids, and the wrong choices she's made in her life.  On a happier side, she does have a friend with benefits and is hoping to find love again, but not before picking a podcast winner that is!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Matt Iseman
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The Host of American Ninja Warrior MATT ISEMAN (who gave up his job as a DOCTOR to become a comedian) comes down from MT MIDORIYAMA to be our GUEST on this episode of Allegedly.  Tune in to find out who is guilty of racial profiling at Snoop Dog’s birthday party, who made late night love to a cat lady, IF the American Ninja Warrior tests its ninjas for performance enhancing drugs AND to hear if Taylor Lautner will accept the challenge to run the American Ninja Warrior course.  Taylor Lautner you have been called out!  Listen. Share. SUBSCRIBE.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Howie Mandel
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Is Howie Mandel returning to America's Got Talent next year?!  Allegedly has the man himself in the hot seat where he talks why he may NOT be returning to AGT and his reported "feud" with Howard Stern!  Ironically, the conversation gets pretty dirty when Howie reveals the worst place he's ever performed at... how his son once fell into a bag of doo doo... and of course, the one celebrity crush that got away (hint:  he'd shake her hand now because she's very clean).  With tales of Spike Lee and Road Rules tours, Howie will have to pick a winner... but it's not who you think.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Jerry O'Connell
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Join Theo and Matt as they welcome film and TV superstar Jerry O'Connell for ALLEGED tales of Scientology, Dutch ovens and Kiefer Sutherland.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Eric Christian Olsen
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Hallelujah!  "Allegedly" inspires this week when "NCIS: Los Angeles" star Eric Christian Olsen stops in to teach us all about the power of failure, the power of fatherhood, and the power of… Natalie Portman!  Olsen lets us in on that time Jim Carrey broke his heart and that time he blew his chance to be in "Star Wars", and reveals how he avoided becoming one of those spoiled "kids from 'Glee'."  By the way, who knew L.L. Cool J's real name was Todd?!  After the hosts share embarrassing stories about Bette Midler and potato guns, Olsen picks a winner… who will it be?

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Maksim Chmerkovskiy
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The sexy, salacious (and non-stuffing) Maksim Chmerkovskiy is our guest this week - and he's holding nothing back!  The Ukranian playboy has got a few things to say about his many years on Dancing with the Stars (or as he calls the show, his brother Val's "problem" now).  Chmerkovskiy fills us in on which contestant he slept with... which contestant he hated with all his being... and most importantly, he addresses that existential question of what to do if you get a boner while dancing.  Hear the hosts regale with tales of film festival plumbing problems and funeral parlor tricks with The Miz, forcing Chmerkovskiy to make a game-changing decision.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Franka Potente
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Our first foreigner joins der show!  German actress Franka Potente (who you know from "Run Lola Run", "Blow", and "The Bourne Identity") gets to play PREISRICHERTIN (that's German for "judge", thanks Google) on this special international episode of "Allegedly".  Frau Potente blows the lid off of life in Hollywood, dropping bombshells like it's World War II.  Did you know Lola was a smoker?  That she didn't speak to Johnny Depp during filming of "Blow"?  And worst of all - that she may be retiring from acting?!  All that, plus stories of Christmas hams, Carvel cakes, oral sex, and the anti-Christ (Kris Jenner that is) on this awesomely cinematic episode.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Mena Suvari
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The sexy Mena Suvari, star of the "American" Trifecta ("Pie", "Beauty" and "Horror Story" that is) drops in to the studio to judge some stories about Glenn Close's bad-ass posse and John Larroquette munching on candy canes.  Find out the path that led Suvari from a toothless kid model to Rice-A-Roni commercials to the star of one of the best films of all time ("American Beauty" of course) and hear Suvari ACTUALLY recreate her lines from an infamous episode of "Boy Meets World".  We'll also get the answer to a very important question - who's a better kisser - Kevin Spacey or Chris Klein?  Only on "Allegedly"

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Jason Ritter
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Attention all of you crazy “Parenthood” fans – Jason Ritter is in the building! Yes, the actor drops in and talks all about that show, as well as what it’s like growing up in Hollywood as the son of the legendary John Ritter. Other topics of discussion including awkward interview questions (like the time Jason got asked how his father was… after he’d passed away), bad auditions (like the time Jason blew his “Spiderman” chances) and of course, PORN! To top it off, Ritter hears the hosts tell tales of Courtney Love and Sunset Strip make-out sessions, and ultimately decides who the victor shall be!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Luenell
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The one and the only Luenell is in the studio, folks!  The "Borat" and "Hotel Transylvania" star discusses all the perks of a being a female comedian in Hollywood, like having groupies ("I screw them and everything") and working with Liam Neeson ("He's super handsome.  He could of gotten it had he asked for it").  Listen as Luenell and the "Allegedly" crew unabashedly swap embarrassing stories about Denzel Washington, Jim Carrey, taking dumps on movie sets, and exploding Cinnabons.  But in the end, not only does Luenell pick a episode winner, but she has the honor of overseeing a whole new segment - The Debate!

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Max Hodges
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Want to know what happens to people after TMZ?  Look no further.  The Jeff Spicoli-looking former face of the show, Max Hodges, rolls out of bed and drops in to reveal some wild stories about partying in Hollywood, rubbing elbows with the likes of Warren G and Matthew McConaughey, and living life one beer can at a time after working for the entertainment conglomerate.  How this man's liver is still functioning, we have no idea!  Join Max as he hears the hosts' awkward tales about meeting Oprah and Brad Pitt and has to decide who's is more embarrassing.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Zachery Ty Bryan
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary:
Zachery Ty Bryan - Brad from the classic sitcom "Home Improvement" - drops a HUGE Oedipal bomb!  On a show that starred Pamela Anderson, turns out dude had quite a thing for his TV mom.  All this plus more BTS stories about Wilson's smoke filled dressing room, the Burger King that Tim Allen sold drugs at and whatever happened to J.T.T. 
  
Meanwhile, poor Z.T.B. gets subjected to stories about Hepatitis scares and ungodly flatulence in the presence of "Dances with Wolves" star Mary McDonnell.  Who will win this episode?  Place your bets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Cheri Oteri
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: Collette Reardon.  Barbara Walters.  Arianna the Spartan Cheerleader.  Cheri Oteri has played many memorable roles on "Saturday Night Live" over the years.  But today, she takes on her biggest one yet - PODCAST JUDGE!  That's right, the actress fills the hot seat in this week's episode of "Allegedly with Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss" where she must choose between two sick hosts who's stories involving Justin Timberlake, Tim Robbins, a porn star, a dildo, and a little Vietnamese boy.  But before she picks, Oteri gets grilled about her favorite "SNL" moment ever... her thoughts on Donald Trump... why she'll never do a reality show... and that time someone asked her to do a cheer in the gynecologist's office.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Jeff Timmons
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The game is on when 98 Degrees band member Jeff Timmons stops by the podcast to judge which host has sunk lower - the one who stole cupcakes from Neil Patrick Harris's birthday party or the one who didn't recognize Wayne Gretzky and asked him to take a picture of himself with someone else?  Timmons also divulges some of his own tales from his many years in La-La Land including what it was like having lady boy groupies in Thailand, that time he got catfished, and the famous actress who tried to woo him by putting on her own movies while they made out.  Only in Hollywood folks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Drew Lynch
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: "America's Got Talent" finalist comic Drew Lynch fills the celebrity judge chair on this episode of "Allegedy with Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss".  After winning over the hearts of America, the speech-impaired comedian earned a free pass straight to the finals of the competition where he plans on battling it out to the end this month.  But before that, he had to come by the podcast to talk about the "AGT" judges and become a judge himself to some of the most embarrassing Hollywood stories you ever heard (hint:  someone pretended they had Parkinson's disease to impress a famous actor).

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Bruce Vilanch
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: The man, the myth, the T-shirts.  Legendary writer, comedian, and multiple Emmy Award winner Bruce Vilanch stops by to judge the "Allegedly" podcast.  Sure, he's written for the Academy Awards, starred on Broadway, been immortalized on "The Simpsons", but he's never been subjected to the torture that is Matt and Theo.  Vilanch spills the dirt on the celebrities who are mad at him, the myth of the "closeted" celebrity, and what Bill Cosby is really like.  In the end, Vilanch has to consider stories involving Scott Baio and Jerry Mathers to ultimately decide who wins the episode.

episodes.seriesTitle: Allegedly with Theo Von  & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.title: Riley Smith
episodes.author: Theo Von & Matthew Cole Weiss
episodes.summary: He may play Rachel McAdams's boy toy on True Detective, but Hollywood stud Riley Smith is the one to get interrogated in this premiere episode of Allegedly with Theo Von and Matthew Cole Weiss.  The never aging star talks getting high with Woody Harrelson, the famous actress who tried to get his number, and what it's like to be eskimo brothers with one of the hosts (you'll never guess which one).  In the end, Smith has to pick which host won the podcast, though with embarrassing stories involving Kirk Douglas and Ice Cube, he sure has his work cut out for him.
